idea-plugin.name: ADB Wireless Manager
idea-plugin.description:
ADB Wireless Manager

A modern, intuitive plugin for managing wireless ADB connections in IntelliJ IDEA and Android Studio.

âœ¨ Features:

  • One-Click Wireless Connection - Connect to Android devices over WiFi without cables
  • Device Management - Save and manage multiple devices for quick access
  • Smart Pairing - Streamlined pairing process with clear instructions
  • Visual Status Monitoring - Real-time ADB status and connection feedback
  • Modern UI - Clean, tabbed interface following IntelliJ design principles
  • Quick Actions - Tools menu integration and keyboard shortcuts
  • Debug Mode - Comprehensive debugging tools for troubleshooting

ğŸš€ Quick Start:

  1. Enable "Wireless debugging" on your Android device (Developer Options)
  2. Open the ADB Wireless tool window (right sidebar)
  3. Enter device name and IP address
  4. Pair once using the pairing code
  5. Connect and start debugging wirelessly!

ğŸ› ï¸ Troubleshooting:

  • Use "Test ADB Connection" to verify ADB installation
  • Enable debug mode in Add Device dialog for detailed logs
  • Check that both devices are on the same WiFi network

Perfect for developers who want to debug Android apps without the hassle of USB cables!
